price: Ẹ wọn òṣùwọ̀n kún nígbà tí ẹ bá wọ̀n ọ́n. Ẹ fi ìwọ̀n tó tọ́¹ wọ̀n ọ́n. Ìyẹn lóore jùlọ, ó sì dára jùlọ ní ìkángun.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn òṣùwọ̀n tí kò tẹ̀ tí kò wọ́.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū al-kayla idhā kil'tum wazinū bil-qis'ṭāsi al-mus'taqīmi dhālika khayrun wa-aḥsanu tawīlan
